rules.description: SpaceFN: Backquote (`) to Escape, Space+[1-9] to F[1-9], Space+0 to F10, Space+Hyphen (-) to F11, Space+Equal Sign (=) to F12, Space+e to Escape, Space+m to Backtick (`), Space+Comma to Tilde (~), Space+Slash (/) to Menu
Exchange hyper + arrow keys with option + arrow keys
SpaceFn: Map Space +( a - z [];'./,) to  Control + ( a -z [];'./,)
